title: Grocery Shopping
description: Buy milk, eggs, bread, fruits (apples, bananas), and vegetables (spinach, tomatoes). Don't forget the special cheese!

title: Gym Workout
description: Leg day: squats, lunges, leg press. Focus on proper form. (Completed)

title: Plan Weekend Getaway
description: Research destinations for a short weekend trip. Consider options like a beach resort or a mountain cabin. Check flight/train availability.
